channel.title: Tools on 蝴蝶飞不过沧海 | Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on 蝴蝶飞不过沧海 | Blog

item.title: Unicode与中文互转
item.description: .font-alert-succ { color: #3c763d; background: #dff0d8; font-size: 16px; margin: 0px auto; /*两边缩进*/ padding:0 2em; /*首行缩进*/ text-indent:2em; border-radius: 25px; margin-left: auto; margin-bottom: auto; } .icons { } .icons a { min-width: 120px; min-height: 35px; width: auto; height: auto; margin: 0px auto; border-radius: 25px; background: rgba(245,143,152); color: #fffffb; display: inline-table; text-align: center; font-size: 20px; margin-left: auto; margin-bottom: auto; } .icons a i{ display: table-cell; vertical-align: middle; } .json_input{ width:100%; height:300px; margin:0; background-color:#EEEEEE; border:1px solid #EEEEEE; padding:0!important; } .json_input:focus{ border-color:transparent; outline:none; background-color:#EEEEEE; } .linedwrap{ margin-bottom:10px; background-color:#EEEEEE; padding:0; } .linedwrap .codelines{ padding:0; } .light{ color:#AAA; } .linedwrap{ width:100% } .linedwrap .codelines .lineno{ font-size:1.1em; } #json_input{ font-size:11px; padding:0px; width:100%; border-radius:4px; } 这款工具能够实现Unicode与中文之间

item.title: 十六进制颜色码表
item.description: 十六进制颜色名称对照表 鸨色#f7acbc 赤白橡#deab8a 油色#817936 绀桔梗#444693 踯躅色#ef5b9c 肌色#fedcbd 伽罗色#7f7522 花色#2b4490 桜色#feeeed 橙色#f47920 青丹#80752c 瑠璃色#2a5caa 蔷薇色#f05b72 灰茶#905
